alert.note: Alert for East Becker; Hubbard; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 9:27AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hubbard, southeastern Beltrami, northeastern Becker and southern Clearwater Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 927 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bagley to Rosby to near Badoura. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bemidji, Park Rapids, Bagley, Redby, Blackduck, Plantagenet Lake and Akeley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; Hubbard; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
